mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ShipEconIndicator (imo, oilConsumption, oilPrice, chartType, charterTime, dailyRent, selectorId) VALUES (#{imo}, #{oilConsumption}, #{oilPrice}, #{chartType}, #{charterTime}, #{dailyRent}, #{selectorId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ShipEconIndicator WHERE imo = #{imo} AND selectorId = #{selectorId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ShipEconIndicator SET oilConsumption = #{oilConsumption}, oilPrice = #{oilPrice}, chartType = #{chartType}, charterTime = #{charterTime}, dailyRent = #{dailyRent} WHERE imo = #{imo} AND selectorId = #{selectorId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ShipEconIndicator WHERE imo = #{imo} AND selectorId = #{selectorId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Ship WHERE imo IN ( SELECT imo FROM ShipEconIndicator WHERE selectorId = #{selectorId} )
